How to get JSON bookmark ?

Linux

Google Chrome

~/.config/google-chrome/Default/Bookmarks

Chromium

~/.config/chromium/Default/Bookmarks

Windows

Google Chrome

C:\Users\{Your Username}\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\User Data\Default\Bookmarks

macOS

Google Chrome

~/Library/Application Support/Google/Chrome/Default/Bookmarks

If above default locations don't exist, please go to chrome://version (manually copy and paste in the URL bar), and look for Profile Path. Then, go to the Profile Path folder on your computer, you should find a file named Bookmarks.

Data Visualization with D3.js
